PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-04082008-02-28,  ,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActExcise Tax Act
PrecisAmendment to the RETURNABLE BEVERAGE CONTAINER (GST/HST) REGULATIONS to simplify compliance for businesses the legislative amendments provide that deposits on beverage containers that are refundable to the consumer are excluded from the GHS/HST base and therefore are not taxable.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2008-0048 Publication Date: 2008-03-19
AttachmentsAttachment
